Still not sure which option is right for you?
Do you have questions about each option?
Do you have dependants to consider?
Then why not speak to a retirement planning expert?
You can arrange a 40-minute phone call to discuss your options with a friendly Lemonade adviser. The adviser is a pensions expert and will answer your questions, guide you through the advantages and disadvantages of each option and send you a personalised report.
What does it cost?
We charge £250 for the consultation and personalised report. However, your EMPLOYER MAY PAY THIS ON YOUR BEHALF. Please get in touch to find out.
How do I pay?
If not covered by your employer, the cost of advice can be taken from your pension pot, or you can pay directly if you prefer.
